title: Blocks and Procs
description:
Practice using blocks and Proc objects.

Steps:
1. Implement `apply_to_five { |x| x * 2 }` so `apply_to_five { |x| x * 2 }` returns 10.
2. Implement `make_adder` so `make_adder(5).call(3)` returns 8.
3. Implement `custom_select` so `custom_select([1,2,3,4]) { |n| n > 2 }` returns [3, 4].

Expected results:
- `apply_to_five { |x| x * 2 }` returns 10
- `make_adder(5).call(3)` returns 8
- `custom_select([1,2,3,4]) { |n| n > 2 }` returns [3, 4]
